channel.title: Overview on Phala Network Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in Overview on Phala Network Wiki

item.title: Run a Local Development Network
item.description: Basic understanding of Linux shell and compiling is necessary to follow this tutorial. Overview In this tutorial, we are going to set up a "Hello World" development environment. We are gonig to deploy a full stack of the core blockchain and connect the Web UI to the blockchain. By the end of the tutorial, you will be able to: Send confidential transactions Get a ready-to-hack version of Phala Network for building your own confidential Dapps A full Phala Network stack has three components plus a Web UI.

item.title: Hello World: your first confidential contract
item.description: Basic understanding of Rust lanugage programming and smart contract development knowledge is necessary to follow this tutorial. Overview In this tutorial, we are going to continue on the development environment we have set up in the previous chapter, and explore how a confidential smart contract is made. By the end of this tutorial, you will: Learn how to develop a confidential contract Interact with the contract from the Web UI Build your own confidental contract For a high-level overview of Phala Network, please check the previous chapters.

item.title: Troubleshooting
item.description: phala-blockchain Probelm: "consider giving accuracy a type" when building substrate error[E0282]: type annotations needed --> .../substrate/primitives/arithmetic/src/fixed_point.rs:541:9 | 541 | let accuracy = P::ACCURACY.saturated_into(); | ^^^^^^^^ consider giving `accuracy` a type ... 1604 | / implement_fixed!( 1605 | | FixedI128, 1606 | | test_fixed_i128, 1607 | | i128, ... | 1611 | | [-170141183460469231731.687303715884105728, 170141183460469231731.687303715884105727]_", 1612 | | ); | |__- in this macro invocation | = note: this error originates in a macro (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info) This is a known issue caused by rust nightly regression.
